ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia overheard mostly every word said, he lost a little when the one was squashed. Damn , phobia exclaimed I knew the egotistical leader would figure it out

Phobia overheard mostly every word said, he lost a little when the 
one was squashed.
"Damn", phobia exclaimed"I knew the egotistical leader would figure 
it out sooner or later," He was hoping that it would take a little 
longer. "I just didn't think one of his lackeys would figure it out 
for him."

Phobia had never personally met Cybershark but the information his 
babies obtained about him helped alot. He instructs the majority of 
his babies to find a place to hide. Hopefully he would still have his 
advantage when this was through.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He was eating his food when he noticed something. It was a 
small insect 
> crawling around the table. He squashed it. Getting up becasue he 
was 
> disgusted to eat his food he walked over to the trash and threw it 
in. He 
> noticed two more in the trash. (They are insects after all) He went 
into the 
> kitchen to grab a drink and noticed somemore by a vent. He went to 
a computer 
> monitor.
>     "Computer give me a schimatic of the ktichen," One popped up 
before him 
> on the screen. He pointed on the screen. "Where does that vent lead 
to?"
>     "To many options to choose from, please specify." The computet 
replied. 
>     "Just show me all of where it leads to," The computer did as it 
was told. 
> The vent ran pratically through all of the ship, and to the 
outside. He 
> picked up a bug and asked the computer to show where all organic 
life forms 
> were in the ship. It showed that there were none in the kitchen, 
including 
> other places. The strange part was that he had one in his hand, and 
could see 
> a few more by a vent. But there were few organic creatures in the 
base at 
> all. Only by the main door.
>     "Battera, I will be right back, I'm going to find Magmatron." 
CyberShark 
> said and rushed out the door. He made his way to the Control room, 
but 
> Magmatron was not there.
>     He asked the computer where Magmatron is. It showed him. He ran 
toward 
> Magmatron.
>     "Sir, I found this bug in the kitchen," CyberShark said out of 
breath. He 
> needed to catch his breath before he could explain.
>     "Yes, we seem to be having an infestation problem. It's nothing 
of 
> importance. Yet." Magmatron replied.
>     "But sir you don't understand, there no--urgk," CyberShark said 
as 
> Magmatron lifted him off the ground by his neck.
>     "Don't tell me what I don't understand. Do yoy understand 
that?" 
> Magmatron said putting him down.
>     "Yes sir. But the Computer doesn't show them as organic 
creatures. They 
> are machines." CyberShark said.
> 
> (I could go further, but I wanna see what Phobia does with this 
news.)
